#include<stdio.h>
 
void IsPalindrome(long long int p,int count)
{
    long long int temp=0,temp2=0;
    temp2 = p;
 
    while(temp2)
    {
        temp = temp2%10 + temp * 10;
        temp2 /= 10;
    }
 
    if(temp == p)
    {
        printf("\n%d %lld",count,temp);
        return;
    }
    else
        IsPalindrome(temp + p,count+1);
}
 
int main()
{
    int t=0;
    long long int p=0;
 
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&p);
        IsPalindrome(p,0);
    }
}
